tweets.text: We have issued a flood warning for the River Taw from Taw Bridge to Newnham Bridge. Riverside locations & roads between Taw Bridge & Newnham Bridge, including Coldridge, Chenson, Eggesford, Chawleigh, Bridge Reeve, & Colleton Mills, might be vulnerable to flooding.

One of several small stage zero #RiverRestoration projects in Swindale looking good today with a bit of water. We breached a section of bank on a perched artifical channel to reconnect the flow with its natural floodplain.
@AquaUoS @GTAlstonWader @WildHaweswater @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/OZfvbz5qi5
@norfolkbookworm @AnglianWater @EnvAgency @BroadsAuth Hi Sarah, thanks for flagging this to us. We are aware of the incident and are currently investigating.

Still some way to go on this but Bedford (Thurleigh 6m N of Bedford) is up to 20.0mm of rain now to 5pm with higher totals further north. South of county is closer to 10mm so far #Beds #rain (img via https://t.co/0eHNEHKGl3) https://t.co/JLr8gDHUhM

#Somerset levels & Moors: The Met office have issued a yellow warning for rain across the South West tomorrow.
We are moving our temporary pumps to Currymoor, ready to pump water off the moors when needed over the Christmas period & when levels in the River Tone allow
#Floodaware https://t.co/xaTDDb91qq

tweets.text:
A lot of news out there...

But don't forget the weather...

Tell friends to follow us and @metoffice for updates... or these great accounts if you've family across England: @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgencyMids and/or @EnvAgencySW

We have extended the opening hours of our operations centre tonight to deal with flooding enquiries.
You can call 01905 845676 until 10pm. 
After 10pm an out of hours service is in operation.
For a full list of road closures follow this link: https://t.co/UeILaPFMuB https://t.co/P1pg8bLtS7

Further rainfall today but phase 1 of the installation of additional pumps has been completed at #Currymoor #Somerset by the Tone & Parrett field teams.  Levels in the River Tone remain high #ContingencyPlanning https://t.co/b0KZhqfXjp
